title: Hunter of Demons
description: What happens when an exorcist falls in love with a demon he's sworn to destroy?Caleb Jansen’s life is going from bad to worse. First he’s possessed by an opinionated vampire spirit who drinks the blood of demons, then pursued by a fundamentalist group who want him dead.His only hope is hotshot federal exorcist John Starkweather…the last man Caleb should be falling for, and the only one he wants in his bed.Alternate cover edition for ASIN B00BB0WCA4For previous cover edition see here
author: Jordan L. Hawk
